verses.verse: Then the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%> Prophesy <S%H5012><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to those shepherds, <S%H7462><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Woe, <S%H1945><s%> shepherds <S%H7462><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> who <S%H834><s%> have been <S%H1961><s%> feeding <S%H7462><s%> themselves! Should not the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> feed <S%H7462><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%>?

"You eat <S%H398><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> and clothe <S%H3847><s%> yourselves <S%H3847><s%> with the wool, <S%H6785><s%> you slaughter <S%H2076><s%> the fat <S%H1277><s%> [sheep] without <S%H3808><s%> feeding <S%H7462><s%> the flock. <S%H6629><s%>

"Those who are sickly <S%H2470><s%> you have not strengthened, <S%H2388><s%> the diseased <S%H2470><s%> you have not healed, <S%H7495><s%> the broken <S%H7665><s%> you have not bound <S%H2280><s%> up, the scattered <S%H5080><s%> you have not brought <S%H7725><s%> back, <S%H7725><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> have you sought <S%H1245><s%> for the lost; but with force <S%H6><s%> and with severity <S%H2394><s%> you have dominated <S%H6531><s%> them.

"And they were scattered <S%H6327><s%> for lack <S%H1097><s%> of a shepherd, <S%H7462><s%> and they became <S%H1961><s%> food <S%H402><s%> for every <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H9130><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> and were scattered. <S%H6327><s%>

"My flock <S%H6629><s%> wandered <S%H7686><s%> through all <S%H3605><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> and on every <S%H3605><s%> high <S%H7311><s%> hill, <S%H1389><s%> and My flock <S%H6629><s%> was scattered <S%H6327><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%> and there <S%H369><s%> was no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> to search <S%H1875><s%> or seek <S%H1245><s%> [for them.]"' "
Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> you shepherds, <S%H7462><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord: <S%H3068><s%>

"As I live, <S%H2416><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> because <S%H3282><s%> My flock <S%H6629><s%> has become <S%H1961><s%> a prey, <S%H957><s%> My flock <S%H6629><s%> has even become <S%H1961><s%> food <S%H402><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the beasts <S%H9130><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> for lack <S%H369><s%> of a shepherd, <S%H7462><s%> and My shepherds <S%H7462><s%> did not search <S%H1875><s%> for My flock, <S%H6629><s%> but [rather] the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> fed <S%H7462><s%> themselves and did not feed <S%H7462><s%> My flock; <S%H6629><s%>
therefore, <S%H3651><s%> you shepherds, <S%H7462><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord: <S%H3068><s%>

'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am against <S%H413><s%> the shepherds, <S%H7462><s%> and I shall demand <S%H1875><s%> My sheep <S%H6629><s%> from them and make them cease <S%H7673><s%> from feeding <S%H7462><s%> sheep. <S%H6629><s%> So the shepherds <S%H7462><s%> will not feed <S%H7462><s%> themselves anymore, <S%H5750><s%> but I shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> My flock <S%H6629><s%> from their mouth, <S%H6310><s%> that they may not be food <S%H402><s%> for them."' "

For thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I Myself <S%H589><s%> will search <S%H1875><s%> for My sheep <S%H6629><s%> and seek <S%H1239><s%> them out.

"As a shepherd <S%H7462><s%> cares <S%H1243><s%> for his herd <S%H5739><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> when he is among <S%H8432><s%> his scattered <S%H6567><s%> sheep, <S%H6629><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> I will care <S%H1239><s%> for My sheep <S%H6629><s%> and will deliver <S%H5337><s%> them from all <S%H3605><s%> the places <S%H4725><s%> to which <S%H834><s%> they were scattered <S%H6327><s%> on a cloudy <S%H6051><s%> and gloomy <S%H6205><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

"And I will bring <S%H3318><s%> them out from the peoples <S%H5971><s%> and gather <S%H6908><s%> them from the countries <S%H776><s%> and bring <S%H935><s%> them to their own land; <S%H127><s%> and I will feed <S%H7462><s%> them on the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> by the streams, <S%H650><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabited <S%H4186><s%> places <S%H4186><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

"I will feed <S%H7462><s%> them in a good <S%H2896><s%> pasture, <S%H4829><s%> and their grazing <S%H5116><s%> ground <S%H5116><s%> will be on the mountain <S%H2022><s%> heights <S%H4791><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%> There <S%H8033><s%> they will lie <S%H7257><s%> down <S%H7257><s%> in good <S%H2896><s%> grazing <S%H5116><s%> ground, <S%H5116><s%> and they will feed <S%H7462><s%> in rich <S%H8082><s%> pasture <S%H4829><s%> on the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
"I will feed <S%H7462><s%> My flock <S%H6629><s%> and I will lead <S%H7257><s%> them to rest, <S%H7257><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>

"I will seek <S%H1245><s%> the lost, bring <S%H6><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> the scattered, <S%H7725><s%> bind <S%H5080><s%> up the broken, <S%H2280><s%> and strengthen <S%H7665><s%> the sick; <S%H2388><s%> but the fat <S%H2470><s%> and the strong <S%H8082><s%> I will destroy. <S%H2389><s%> I will feed <S%H8045><s%> them with judgment. <S%H7462><s%>

"And as for you, My flock, <S%H6629><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> 'Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will judge <S%H8199><s%> between <S%H996><s%> one sheep <S%H7716><s%> and another, <S%H7716><s%> between the rams <S%H352><s%> and the male <S%H6260><s%> goats. <S%H6260><s%>

'Is it too <S%H4480><s%> slight <S%H4592><s%> a thing <S%H4592><s%> for you that you should feed <S%H7462><s%> in the good <S%H2896><s%> pasture, <S%H4829><s%> that you must tread <S%H7429><s%> down <S%H7429><s%> with your feet <S%H7272><s%> the rest <S%H3499><s%> of your pastures <S%H4829><s%>? Or that you should drink <S%H8354><s%> of the clear <S%H4950><s%> waters, <S%H4325><s%> that you must foul <S%H7511><s%> the rest <S%H3498><s%> with your feet <S%H7272><s%>?

'And as for My flock, <S%H6629><s%> they must eat <S%H7462><s%> what <S%H4823><s%> you tread <S%H4823><s%> down <S%H4823><s%> with your feet, <S%H7272><s%> and they must drink <S%H8354><s%> what <S%H4833><s%> you foul <S%H4833><s%> with your feet! <S%H7272><s%>' "

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3068><s%> to them, "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I, even I, will judge <S%H8199><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the fat <S%H1277><s%> sheep <S%H7716><s%> and the lean <S%H7330><s%> sheep. <S%H7716><s%>

"Because <S%H3282><s%> you push <S%H1920><s%> with side <S%H6654><s%> and with shoulder, <S%H3802><s%> and thrust <S%H1920><s%> at all <S%H3605><s%> the weak <S%H2470><s%> with your horns, <S%H7161><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> you have scattered <S%H6327><s%> them abroad, <S%H2351><s%>

therefore, I will deliver <S%H3467><s%> My flock, <S%H6629><s%> and they will no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> be a prey; <S%H957><s%> and I will judge <S%H8199><s%> between <S%H996><s%> one sheep <S%H7716><s%> and another. <S%H7716><s%>

"Then I will set <S%H6965><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them one <S%H259><s%> shepherd, <S%H7462><s%> My servant <S%H5650><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> and he will feed <S%H7462><s%> them; he will feed <S%H7462><s%> them himself <S%H1931><s%> and be their shepherd. <S%H7462><s%>

"And I, the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> will be their God, <S%H430><s%> and My servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> will be prince <S%H5387><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them; I, the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> have spoken. <S%H1696><s%>

"And I will make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> with them and eliminate <S%H7673><s%> harmful <S%H7451><s%> beasts <S%H9130><s%> from the land, <S%H776><s%> so that they may live <S%H3427><s%> securely <S%H983><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> and sleep <S%H3462><s%> in the woods. <S%H3293><s%>

"And I will make <S%H5414><s%> them and the places <S%H5439><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> My hill <S%H1389><s%> a blessing. <S%H1293><s%> And I will cause showers <S%H1653><s%> to come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> in their season; <S%H6256><s%> they will be showers <S%H1653><s%> of blessing. <S%H1293><s%>

"Also the tree <S%H6086><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> will yield <S%H5414><s%> its fruit, <S%H6529><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> will yield <S%H5414><s%> its increase, <S%H2981><s%> and they will be secure <S%H983><s%> on their land. <S%H127><s%> Then they will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> when I have broken <S%H7665><s%> the bars <S%H4133><s%> of their yoke <S%H5923><s%> and have delivered <S%H5337><s%> them from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of those who enslaved <S%H5647><s%> them.

"And they will no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> be a prey <S%H957><s%> to the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and the beasts <S%H9130><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> will not devour <S%H398><s%> them; but they will live <S%H3427><s%> securely, <S%H983><s%> and no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> will make <S%H2729><s%> [them] afraid. <S%H2729><s%>

"And I will establish <S%H6965><s%> for them a renowned <S%H8034><s%> planting <S%H4302><s%> place, <S%H4302><s%> and they will not again <S%H5750><s%> be victims <S%H622><s%> of famine <S%H7458><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> and they will not endure <S%H5375><s%> the insults <S%H3639><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> anymore. <S%H5750><s%>

"Then they will know <S%H3045><s%> that I, the Lord <S%H3068><s%> their God, <S%H430><s%> am with them, and that they, the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> are My people, <S%H5971><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>

"As for you, My sheep, <S%H6629><s%> the sheep <S%H6629><s%> of My pasture, <S%H4830><s%> you are men, <S%H120><s%> and I am your God, <S%H430><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>
